title: Bump Off Lover
resume:
Bump Off Lover is a 2006 Taiwanese drama starring Angela Chang.
It was boardcasted on free-to-air China Television from 19 February 2006 to 14 May 2006, every Sunday at 22:00 and cable TV Gala Television Variety Show/CH 28 on 25 February 2006 to 20 May 2006, every Saturday at 21:30 to 23:00.
Angela Chang was nominated for Best Leading Actress in a Television Series at the 41st Golden Bell Awards for her role as Xu Yi Zhen/Xu Yi Jing.
